item.title: Spark installation in vagrant
item.description: Reference: thank you Bin Ubuntu xenial This was done inside a vagrant machine; ubuntu xenial (16.04). $ vagrant init envimation/ubuntu-xenial $ vagrant up $ vagrant ssh and you’re in. Install openjdk sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y openjdk-8-jdk && ll /usr/lib/jvm/ && ll /usr/bin/java && ll /etc/alternatives/java && sudo update-alternatives –config java sudo ln -s /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64 /opt/jdk export JAVA_HOME=‘/opt/jdk’ && echo $JAVA_HOME
